REUTERS.UNKNOWN: T C f0011 reute r f BC-IBC-CLOSES-EXPORT-REG 04-05 0057

TEXT.TITLE: IBC CLOSES EXPORT REGISTRATIONS - IBC OFFICIAL
TEXT.BODY: The Brazilian Coffee Institute (IBC) confirmed having closed May export registrations, effective April 6. On Friday night exporters said they had heard of the closure from IBC officials, but the officials could not at the time be reached for confirmation. REUTER
